trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a program contains invalid Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) or metadata.
trans-unit.target: 当程序包含无效的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 或元数据时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Generally this indicates a bug in the compiler that generated the program.
trans-unit.target: 这通常表示生成该程序的编译器中存在 bug。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.InvalidProgramException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDPROGRAM, which has the value 0x8013153A.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidProgramException> 使用 HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDPROGRAM，其值 0x8013153A。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InvalidProgramException>, see the <xref:System.InvalidProgramException> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.InvalidProgramException>，请参阅<xref:System.InvalidProgramException>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.InvalidProgramException>, see article Q312544, "What to Do If You Receive an InvalidProgramException Error Message," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.InvalidProgramException>，请参阅文章 Q312544，"什么到执行如果你收到 InvalidProgramException 错误消息，"Microsoft 知识库中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.InvalidProgramException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.InvalidProgramException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.InvalidProgramException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.InvalidProgramException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new exception to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Metadata is incorrect."
trans-unit.target: 构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"元数据不正确。"的新异常

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InvalidProgramException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.InvalidProgramException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.InvalidProgramException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.InvalidProgramException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new exception using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性的新异常使用`message`参数。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InvalidProgramException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.InvalidProgramException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />），则在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发当前异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.InvalidProgramException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.InvalidProgramException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: `InnerException` 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `InnerException`）。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InvalidProgramException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.InvalidProgramException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
